name: SPIDER SK8
description:
Spider Pro Skater

Score 10,000 points as quickly as possible to warp on out in the web cloud (no pun intended).

How to Play
  • SPACE to start
  • W/A/S/D or ARROW KEYS to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • ESCAPE to restart
  • H to put on Spooder’s hat
Credits Concept Artists
